data.lyric:
[ti:Man Of The Year (Explicit)]
[ar:Juice WRLD]
[al:Legends Never Die (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Man Of The Year (Explicit) - Juice WRLD
[00:00.34]Lyrics by：Rex Kudo/Skrillex/Joe Reeves/Jarad Higgins/Everett Romano
[00:00.69]Composed by：Rex Kudo/Skrillex/Joe Reeves/Jarad Higgins/Everett Romano
[00:01.04]Cheers
[00:01.44]
[00:04.23]Sippin' codeine like it's beer
[00:06.03]
[00:06.79]I'm in London so I'm screaming "Cheers"
[00:08.71]
[00:11.22]Man of the year still got problems
[00:13.89]Lookin' in the mirror you look awful
[00:16.54]Talkin' to myself do it too often
[00:19.29]JK Juice WRLD you're so awesome
[00:22.20]Um I'm running up funds
[00:24.04]Bottle full of pills let's have fun
[00:26.75]No cheap thrills only rich ones
[00:29.47]Fire drills hotter than the sun
[00:33.16]
[00:33.98]My ups and downs
[00:36.53]I'll jot them down
[00:39.19]In London town
[00:42.10]Cheers to the golden years
[00:43.63]Let's raise our hands let's sing and dance
[00:50.18]I know I'm here to save you I know I'm here to save you
[00:55.02]Let's raise our hands and sing and dance
[01:00.86]I know my lyrics saved you I know I helped your breakthrough
[01:05.96]They say life's a puzzle well I'ma piece it together
[01:08.59]But from the way I'm movin' I'll probably be piecing forever
[01:11.21]I date a bad b***h she'll be over decent forever
[01:13.99]Even with fake tits these other h*es just decent forever
[01:16.71]My lady said she saw a baddie in the hotel lobby
[01:19.93]Well love let's f**k her together
[01:22.50]We got the world to our backs give a f**k never have
[01:25.03]Middle fingers up we're screamin' "f**k 'em" forever
[01:27.48]
[01:29.07]My ups and downs
[01:31.65]I'll jot them down
[01:34.36]In London town
[01:37.17]Cheers to the golden years
[01:39.31]
[01:39.85]My ups and downs
[01:42.67]I'll jot them down
[01:45.43]In London town
[01:48.07]Cheers to the golden years
[01:50.04]Let's raise our hands let's sing and dance
[01:56.15]I know I'm here to save you I know I'm here to save you
[02:00.99]Let's raise our hands and sing and dance
[02:07.19]I know my lyrics saved you I know I helped your breakthrough
data.trans:
[ti:Man Of The Year (Explicit)]
[ar:Juice WRLD]
[al:Legends Never Die (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯音乐享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:00.34]//
[00:00.69]//
[00:01.04]干杯
[00:01.44]
[00:04.23]我像喝啤酒一样畅饮那种玩意
[00:06.03]
[00:06.79]我在伦敦 我欢呼干杯
[00:08.71]
[00:11.22]我是年度风云人物 可我仍然麻烦缠身
[00:13.89]我看着镜中的自己 你的气色糟透了
[00:16.54]我常常这样自言自语
[00:19.29]开玩笑的 Juice WRLD 你是最棒的
[00:22.20]我赚到盆满钵满
[00:24.04]瓶子里装满药片 让我们纵享欢乐
[00:26.75]我不会贪图一时之欢 追求极致的快乐
[00:29.47]热情似火 比烈日更加炙热
[00:33.16]
[00:33.98]我经历的高山低谷
[00:36.53]我会一一记录下来
[00:39.19]我在伦敦城里
[00:42.10]为流金岁月举杯欢庆
[00:43.63]让我们高举双手 一起唱歌和跳舞吧
[00:50.18]我知道我是来拯救你的 我知道我是来拯救你的
[00:55.02]让我们高举双手 载歌载舞
[01:00.86]我知道我写的歌词拯救了你 我知道我帮你突破难关
[01:05.96]人们说人生就是谜团 我会把这一切拼凑起来
[01:08.59]但从我的行动来看 或许我会永远拼凑我的人生
[01:11.21]我与一个坏女人约会 她会永远变得得体迷人
[01:13.99]即使不是真材实料 这些碧池也会显得得体迷人
[01:16.71]我的女孩说她在酒店大堂看见一个坏人
[01:19.93]好吧 爱人 让她加入我们吧
[01:22.50]我们把世界抛脑后 不顾一切
[01:25.03]竖起中指 我们呐喊 去他妈的
[01:27.48]
[01:29.07]我经历的高山低谷
[01:31.65]我会一一记录下来
[01:34.36]我在伦敦城里
[01:37.17]为流金岁月举杯欢庆
[01:39.31]
[01:39.85]我经历的高山低谷
[01:42.67]我会一一记录下来
[01:45.43]我在伦敦城里
[01:48.07]为流金岁月举杯欢庆
[01:50.04]让我们高举双手 一起唱歌和跳舞吧
[01:56.15]我知道我是来拯救你的 我知道我是来拯救你的
[02:00.99]让我们高举双手 载歌载舞
[02:07.19]我知道我写的歌词拯救了你 我知道我帮你突破难关
